{"id":610389072,"lang":"java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1640960191,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/610389072/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"39.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String addStrings(String num1, String num2) {\n        int carry =0;\n        String ans = \"\";\n        int i = num1.length()-1; int j = num2.length()-1;\n        while(i>=0 || j>=0){\n            int count =0;\n            if(i>=0)\n                count+=Character.getNumericValue(num1.charAt(i));\n            if(j>=0)\n                count+= Character.getNumericValue(num2.charAt(j));\n            count +=carry;\n            carry = count/10;\n            count = count%10;\n            ans = String.valueOf(count) + ans;\n            i-- ;j--;\n            \n        }\n        if(carry>0){\n            ans  = String.valueOf(carry) + ans;\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
